content: I do not understand why this company is…I do not understand why this company is in business and why these internet services allow them to push their product on their platform I ordered a photo and never received it never any confirmation or anything this is a complete scam and I'm going to push to make sure that they can never do this to anyone else.Date of experience: August 18, 2024

I ordered dessert stands several months…I ordered dessert stands several months ago and still have not received my shipment. I have tried calling customer support over 20 times and emailed various times as well with absolutely no answer or response. I have purchased their items before through Amazon and never had a problem so I thought I could order from their website and it seems like they are not legit. Not sure what to do. I just want my 100 dollars back.Date of experience: May 16, 2022

I ordered dessert stands over a month…I ordered dessert stands over a month ago and still have not received my shipment. I have tried calling customer support over 15 time and emailed various times aswell with absolutely no answer or responseDate of experience: May 10, 2022

It’s been like 15 days and my order is…It’s been like 15 days and my order is not showing any movement on the tracking number . I called costumer service and they said they were going to talk to the warehouse and see if they had the item or not, they also said they were going to let me know the same day or next day morning. It’s been a week and I haven’t heard from them. My wedding is coming soon and I need this item as soon as possible .Date of experience: April 05, 2022

Wonderful customer service & great productsI ordered some gold cupcake and cake stands. The products arrived packaged very well.  I did experience some problems with FedEX delivery and I contacted Amalfi Decor support.  This company was really fast with their response!  I was impressed!  Once I received my stands, they looked wonderful!  I will definitely do more business with this company in the future!Date of experience: August 10, 2021

The chandelier received is of excellent…The chandelier received is of excellent quality!! Shipping was fast, product better than expected, and truly the pictures don’t give the true essence of its beauty! I had to contact customer service because I changed my mind and wanted the 5 light versus 4 light and even that process was flawless!! I will definitely purchase other products!Date of experience: January 12, 2022

Beautiful! ... know your "gold" :)Beautiful!  Exactly as the pictures.I did learn (by confused experience) that "gold" (in general .... everywhere, every company) is more like the Crayola crayon gold ... kind of what I would describe as brassy or antique; all companies are consistent with one another. This is "gold", and the bright shiny yellow-gold is called "chrome gold".  Both are beautiful, but it if matters to you ... now you know... and so do I.Date of experience: October 15, 2020

Exceptional Products and Service - AmalfiI could not be happier with the two chandeliers I purchased from Amalfi.  It's difficult to find "classic" designs, and after searching all of the "usual" home improvement stores, lighting stores, and home decor sites, I finally found Amalfi.  The lights arrived in perfect condition - very carefully and secruely packed.  They were very easy to install and look great. I had a question about installation, sent an e-mail, and it was answered within minutes!  I cannot wait for my next redecorating project.  I will certainly visit Amalfi again.  Thanks!!Date of experience: October 08, 2020

I wanted a small crystal chandelier…I wanted a small crystal chandelier with a gold finish which I found at Amalfi Decor for a very reasonable price.  The item was received in a very short time and was well packaged.  The chandelier is absolutely beautiful.  More so than the photographs.  The light was of very good quality and the gold is beautiful doesn't look cheap at all.  Instructions were clear and easy to read.  I am extremely pleased with my first purchase and will continue to patronize Amalfi Decor for future purchases.Date of experience: October 20, 2020

Beautiful Chandelier, Confusion about Silver WireEverything went great with putting the chandelier up and arriving in one piece. The only part that we are lost on still and was not clear in the swag installation instructions is what to do with what I think might be the silver ground wire coming from the top. Weary to cut it off but from trying to interpret the hard wire instructions I think it would be safe to do so. We had some trouble getting the wing to open in the ceiling but that was more an issue of not being familiar with the inner working and thickness of drywall for my apartment building. Amalfi provided all of the hardware required to put it up. Shining brightly and beautiful! Now to just figure out the silver wire :)Date of experience: January 19, 2021

Superior QualitySuperior Quality - Thank you Amalfi Decor for having superior quality cake and dessert stands.  This is my first purchase and am so pleased with the style, sturdiness, and weight of the stands.  Making thousands of mini desserts and wedding cakes for destination wedding parties in the Florida Keys, I am thrilled to now be integrating your high quality stands into my collection of offerings.  Thank you for having a selection in not only style but color.  I look forward to purchasing more as Amalfi Decor re-stocks products that are on my wish list.Date of experience: August 13, 2021

Terrible communication !Terrible communication !! Been trying to reach this company for days.  No return voicemails or emails   Wondering if items will ever be shippedDate of experience: April 28, 2022

I ordered several gold cupcake stands…I ordered several gold cupcake stands and they were absolutely perfect for a dessert table I designed for a wedding this past weekend. Anytime I needed cupcake stands or other table decorations, I have always ordered from them. Thank you for making beautiful products!Date of experience: October 13, 2020

mid-century modern styleBeautiful mid-century modern style cake plate! I love the cheery yellow & that the plate unscrews from the heavy base for easy cleaning. It's exactly what I've been looking for for months, and no wedding required! :-)Date of experience: May 03, 2021

I needed clear crystal drops for an…I needed clear crystal drops for an antique bowl I recently purchased, and these are beautiful.  If I need to replace any crystals for future purchases, Almalfi Decor will be my "Go To" place to shop.Date of experience: May 10, 2021

The cake stand I ordered was beautifulThe cake stand I ordered was beautiful,  even better than the pictures. Delivered carefully boxed, after being placed in a styrofoam surround. I am impressed and would not hesitate to shop with this company should the need arise again.Date of experience: June 03, 2021

POOR customer service!!!!POOR customer service!!!!The packaging is horrendous.. uses styrofoam which breaks easily and makes a huge mess PLUS its horrible for the environment. for the prices you pay for items you'd think they would package in better packaging that doesn't make a huge mess. expect to vacuum when unpacking this. It's hard to restore items in original packaging because of that awful styrofoam. customer service is horrible. returns are not free and expect to pay upwards of 40$ to return 3 items. if you opened the plastic they consider the item used and will refuse your return so if you are unsure about an item don't open the plastic to inspect your item or else they won't accept the return. items are made in CHINA not worth the full prices on their website. if you want something wait for their sale don't buy it full price, there's no price adjustments if you miss the sale. they are missing the key aspect of customer service and don't honor anything favorable to the customer. be 100% sure you want to keep the item before buying or lose $$ paying for your returns.Response: I specifically told you I'll never be buying from you again, wherein that statement do you see I was satisfied.Date of experience: November 30, 2020

I have not received my itemsI have not received my items, I ordered on April 4th...it is now the 12th and they have not shipped. I tried calling and emailing customer service and received no response. Incredibly frustrated given I need for an event next week and I though I had ordered with ample time.Date of experience: April 12, 2022

My 4th chandelier from this companyMy 4th chandelier from this company, all are very beautiful, great quality and price. I bought the plug in, it has a switch to turn it off and on. The Large crystals are real, the bead strands are plastic. You cannot tell they are fake unless you look really close. I get so many compliments on my lamps, I bought the lamp shades separately from Ebay and Amazon. Fast shipping, excellent customer service. They also send extra crystals in case any thing goes wrong!:)Date of experience: January 15, 2021

This cake stand is so incredibly…STRONG!This cake stand is so incredibly sturdy! My cakes are small but mighty, with LOTS of buttercream and filling. I have no worries about the stand tipping on me. Thank you for creating such a beautiful and strong stand!!! - Cristal Hamer, @OtherSideCakes on InstagramDate of experience: March 26, 2021

I ordered this items on MondayI ordered this items on Monday, and My event was on Sunday. I emailed right after I placed the order, if customer service can confirm with me that I can get it by Saturday. If not, I asked them to cancel my order. Order did not came on next Monday which is after my event. I could not able to use for my event, and it messed up all my plan. However, Now I need to pay return shipping about $80, and this is very disappointed. I told them if you can give me extra discount for this order, I was willing to take all the items. I will not recommend this Amalfi decor company anymore.Date of experience: December 16, 2020

Amalfi decor is amazingAmalfi decor is amazing! Not only do I love the white 27” trumpet vases for my wedding but I accidentally had them shipped to my mother’s  address in MA and when they arrived I called customer service and Maria was so pleasant and easy to deal with. She was helpful and patient and got my vases to me in all the way Canada with ease. If your wondering about this company don’t they are awesome! Products came quick with FedEx tracking. They are easy to get a hold of, no long waits on the phone. Super friendly customer service agents and competitive pricing. Got for it!Date of experience: July 22, 2021

I place an orderI place an order . I  made to understand that the item was in stock.  Then on the day I should have received my item that's when they sent me an email telling that my item is in some container waiting to be clear . I am highly annoyed because this is the first time ordering from this company and so far it has not been honest!!! I have a event on the 7th October I need this item .Date of experience: October 02, 2021

Dealing with Amalfi Decor was greatDealing with Amalfi Decor was great!  I did have to return the item I purchased but NOT because it was not satisfactory but because it did not work for the project that I needed it for.  They gave me NO issues at all when I reached out to them that I had to return the chandelier ... which I must say was beautiful!  I will definitely keep them in mind for any future needs.Date of experience: November 18, 2020

I absolutely love my new chandelierI absolutely love my new chandelier, it's gorgeous! Its in my bathroom right above where I put on my makeup, not only do I have great lighting but the AMBIENCE!! And amalfi took care of a minor situation ao fast I don't want to call it a problem. Dealing with them is a situation not a problem. Can't wait to get more of their amazing glamorous stuff for my fancy bathroom!Date of experience: January 05, 2021

Well Worth It!I’ve never purchased from this site, so I was definitely skeptical about buying, but every single piece purchased was well worth it! Had 2 washers missing from the box, but I was (and I am still) happy about my purchase.Date of experience: October 14, 2020

All around pleasedHad a question about delivery.  Called and actually got a person!  She was personable, helpful and gave correct info.  Got my item the day she stated.  Was packaged very nicely.  Great quality item that the bride loved for her 5 tier wedding cake!Date of experience: September 27, 2021

I got the 4 Light Vintage Crystal…I got the 4 Light Vintage Crystal Plug-In Chandelier (Gold) and it is Beautiful! Unfortunately, some of the crystals had chunks of glass and/or scratches on them, and there weren't enough back-up crystals that came with it, so I reached out to the company, and Victoria was very helpful with getting a variety of crystals sent out immediately (when I say "immediately" I mean they were shipped over night and I had them the next day).  I was very impressed with the excellent customer service, and I'm in love with this chandelier! It looks Stunning in person!! I would definitely recommend this company.Date of experience: July 26, 2021

The item I ordered arrived very…The item I ordered arrived very promptly and was pack really well.The quality of the 3-PieceTall Metal Ribbon Cake Stand Set is very good and as described.  The pricing of the Cake Stand Set was very reasonable based on the quality.   I was very please with the huge selection  cake stand and other items, and will not hesitate to order again from Amalfi Decor.Sincerely, Ms. CuiltyDate of experience: February 25, 2021

Great serviceGreat service.  Ordered online and had the chandelier within days.  There was some confusion as to when it would arrive as the date to receive at my home kept moving but in the end, it came in within a day of the original date.Date of experience: November 24, 2020

The customer service is amazingThe customer service is amazing, I never experienced something like this. They go out of their way to help in any way. I totally recommend Amalfi. Products  are beautiful!Date of experience: January 29, 2021

Lamp okay, glass drops are drekIt is a good thing that I was not planning on using the hanging glass drops on this lamp.  They were barely attached and the small wire rings that were supposed to hold them in place were of a smaller mil wire than a paper clip.  It took me less than 5 minutes to remove them when I took the lamp out of the bo.  Some of them were not really attached to the lamp at all.  The lamp itself seems okay although I have not yet had it installed.  The lamp itself is of a hefty weight and I like the shade.  If you want to use this lamp without the cheap bric a brac like I am you will probably be okay.Date of experience: January 16, 2021

Product is more expensive than…Product is more expensive than competitors but is also better quality. Well package in boxes than can be use for storage to protect the display from being damaged or gathering dust.Date of experience: December 08, 2020

Fast service and shippingFast service and shipping.  These are our favorite cupcake holders for Weddings.  We already have the gold ones so this was a perfect addition to our Wedding stands.Thank you!Date of experience: December 16, 2020

I received this very quickly and…love itI received this very quickly and packaged well.  I understand why some say it takes a bit of time to put the crystals on because it should!  It’s packaged so to protect the fragile parts.  No complaints, it’s beautiful.Date of experience: July 25, 2021

I love these cake stands!!I love these cake stands!!! They a great addition to my everyday content creating tools. They are so simple in design, yet very elegant and versitile. I love the variety of colors you have. Hoping they get restocked soon!!!!Date of experience: July 27, 2021

First Time BuyerI ordered two cake stands, rose gold and black.  I did expedited shipping and they arrived in 3 days in perfect condition.  Very sturdy and clean lines.   I will be purchasing more in the future!Date of experience: March 04, 2021

Perfect cake stands!The cake stands I purchased elevated the cake and desserts to new heights (pun intended)!  They were the perfect addition to my clients wedding.  I will definitely order again!Date of experience: October 07, 2020

Beautiful cake stand and very quick…Beautiful cake stand and very quick delivery! The product was even better than expected. Very good quality. Definitely will order from this company again!Date of experience: October 14, 2020

I unexpectedly received my package…I unexpectedly received my package literally the next day after ordering! I had no idea shipping was that fast, I didn't pay for priority or anything like that so I was very pleasantly surprised!Date of experience: June 01, 2021

Perfect touch for a bit of glam!Perfect touch for a bit of glam!Love the candles, love the crystal and the graceful lines. And since it plugs into the wall and hangs on a ceiling hook...it saves making a hole in the ceiling and having to call the electrician to wire a chandelier.Perfect!Date of experience: January 21, 2021

Absolutely love it!These cake stands are so pretty and so perfect. I got the 3-Piece Glass Top Crystal Cake Stand Set in gold, silver and rose gold and its so beautiful! I would definitely recommend buying these. Packing was great. No cracks, no chips. And it came on time.Date of experience: January 02, 2021

No response from customer serviceI have not received the ordered product and have received no responses to multiple emails / voicemails to customer service seeking information regarding my order status.I previously ordered the product multiple times and had no problems, so I do not understand what is happening this time....Date of experience: April 15, 2022

This is the first time I have done…thank you for a great job.This is the first time I have done business with this company. Real easy. It was very well packed. I purchased a mini chandelier for my camper. I had the tracker and watched it leave California and made it to Florida in no time but was stuck in Pensacola due to Hurricane Sally. But received it very quickly. Looking forward to doing business if need be.Date of experience: October 14, 2020

This silver pedestal cake plate was…beautiful.This silver pedestal cake plate was purchased for my son’s wedding cake.  It arrived in a timely manner, was good quality, and beautiful.Date of experience: June 02, 2021
Bad because 1 of my item came damage…Bad because 1 of my item came damage and I sent 3 emails and nobody answer my email to find a solución bad service andDate of experience: March 21, 2022
These are simply Beautiful!!!These are simply Beautiful, I love them, they  looks so expensive, very sturdy, they were also packaged and received on time.Date of experience: December 11, 2020

The product seems to be very good…The product seems to be very good qualiy (haven't used it yet) my only issue is the color it seemed more shiny gold on the picture. In reality it's almost bronze. Everything else is perfectDate of experience: August 03, 2021

I was very impressed with my beautiful…I was very impressed with my beautiful cup cake holder.  It is such a quality item and arrived in just days!  Will use Amalfi again and recommend to my friends and family.Date of experience: May 12, 2021
Love that their shipping is super fastLove that their shipping is super fast. Ordered Tuesday morning and by Wednesday my shipment was at my front doorDate of experience: July 13, 2021

Beautiful cake standThe item is stunning, perfect size, very sturdy and arrived quickly, can't wait to use at my party. I would definitely recommend to others.  It's worth it for the price, thank you!Date of experience: October 14, 2020
Everything was excellentEverything was excellent, buying was easy, delivery was extremely fast and most of all my mini chandelier is absolutely adorable. I love it.Date of experience: August 15, 2021
Elegant Candle HoldersThe candle holders exceeded my expectations in terms of the good quality and elegant design.  This is a great enhancement to my dinning room!Date of experience: January 11, 2022

I have reached out twice to the company…I have reached out twice to the company with no reply. I placed an order a month ago and have not received my item nor any updates about shipping.Date of experience: March 12, 2022

I wish I could give this company 0/5…I wish I could give this company 0/5 stars. I ordered the 16 Inch Round Vintage Metal Wedding Cake Stand in Gold on March 13th for my wedding on May 14th. I received a notification email that my order shipped on March 30th. After checking the shipping status and seeing that it was still in the “Label Created” status, I contacted Amalfi Decor’s customer service regarding the status of my order on April 12th. I was told that it was now considered “lost” and that they would not be able to send me another at the time because they were out of stock, however, they had the 14 inch version of the same exact cake stand in stock that they could ship right away and I would receive a $10 refund for the price difference. I agreed, since I could still make that size work with my wedding cake, and received the refund. Now, it is May 6th and I STILL have yet to receive a cake stand from them and they STILL have $57.49 of my money that was remaining towards the 14 inch cake stand. Since it is too close to my wedding, I have already had to order a different cake stand from another company and am trying to receive the remainder of my refund. I have called several times on multiple different days and no one answers. I have also sent multiple emails requesting the refund and have not received a response. I have had to escalate the issue to PayPal to attempt to get my money back since Amalfi Decor does not want to correct this issue. I would absolutely recommend NOT purchasing from this company, unless you would like to deal with the headache of not receiving your order and then not being able to reach them for a refund.Date of experience: May 06, 2022
Happy Customer!Very happy with the cake stand, it is absolutely beautiful and exactly what we had hoped for. Very sturdy, yet elegant!Date of experience: March 09, 2021

I love the items and the quality and…I love the items and the quality and price is great very understandable customer service,and very quick in resolving my issue Thank youDate of experience: March 16, 2021
The product is beautiful we are using…The product is beautiful we are using them for center pieces for our wedding exactly what i ordered i recievedDate of experience: January 12, 2022
Excellent productsExcellent products. The packaging were neat and secured. Can wait to display them  with my cake orders in November 21, 2021.Date of experience: October 27, 2021

I was extremely happy with my productI was extremely happy with my product. I couldn’t find the mini chandelier anywhere. I called Amalfi direct and I received the chandelier in 6 days. The woman I spoked to was very helpful. I would order from them direct again.Date of experience: July 22, 2021
Item arrived damaged twiceItem arrived damaged when ordered through Walmart. Ordered again direct and it arrived damaged again.Date of experience: February 25, 2022

Simply BeautifulI just love my stands they are even more beautiful in person than on the website.  I can’t wait to use them next month on my wedding day.  Thank you so much for my beautiful standsDate of experience: April 12, 2021
Beautiful Cake Stand!Quick deliver, good value and quality, and a beautiful wedding cake stand!  Will be using it in 2 weeks.Date of experience: October 07, 2020
Super happyI'm glad I purchased a few stands from Amalfi. They're made with s thick material and shine beautifully.Date of experience: April 18, 2021

I never received my order for months…I never received my order for months after I ordered. I had messaged on instagram, on email and there was no reply. I feel scammed.Date of experience: May 18, 2022
Ordered this very sophisticated crystal…Ordered this very sophisticated crystal orb chandelier at $174. The packaging was safe and the item was intact. ThanksDate of experience: November 21, 2020
I received my order quickly and the…I received my order quickly and the cake stand is beautiful and sturdy! I highly recommend and will order more in the future.Date of experience: December 07, 2020
So glad I purchased!I have wanted to purchase a cake stand for awhile and finally did this year after Thanksgiving.  It shipped quick and is beautiful!Date of experience: December 11, 2021

Rose gold StandI’ve always wanted an Amalfi stand. Decided to jump on it and purchase. My order was placed on March 21st and I received by a March 24th. Fast service and I’m very happy with my purchase. Now to get the other colors when they are back in stockDate of experience: March 29, 2021

In loveI had these beautiful vases on my list for a while. Every time, I would want to purchase they were sold out. I was very lucky to have found them and purchased 2 sets. They are very elegant and very good quality. I will be using them for candy tables. 💕😁Date of experience: May 12, 2021
Elegant cake plateWe received this beautiful cake plate in a timely manner. It’s gorgeous and can’t wait to see our wedding cake on it!Date of experience: October 14, 2020
Beautiful!The modern cake stands are beautifully simple and lovely.  I purchased both 8" and 12".  The packing was amazing and they arrived quickly!  Love them!!Date of experience: December 04, 2020
Our first cake plateau…Ordered our first cake plateau for our inventory. The experience was easy and quick. The quality is fantastic.Date of experience: February 22, 2021

I am very happy with my beautiful cake…A very Happy Customer!😊I am very happy with my beautiful cake stands and will come back for more products. The prices were good too! I have a Mobile TeaParTea and Wedding service would love to see other items in that industry. Thank you so much!Date of experience: October 16, 2020

Absolutely love this cake stand!!Absolutely love this cake stand!!! It looks even better in person. It’s great quality!! I used at my sons first birthday party and will be able to use it again many times!!Date of experience: March 12, 2022
Excellent quality!Excellent quality!! Arrived before the scheduled date! Very well packed! Really worth it!Date of experience: April 22, 2021
Won’t be disappointedI’ve been wanting these tiered trays for a while now. They didn’t disappoint. Really good quality and look amazing in our table.Date of experience: April 09, 2021

Sometimes an apothecary jar can mean much more than just a jar...A few weeks ago, post full-rent, I bought 4 beautiful apothecary jars as the "crown jewel" display for our buffet table, just as this COVID19 pandemic nightmare was hitting my town, NYC. We all know what happened here, and that those here, are still fighting to stay alive and keep our loved ones safe. Nothing is "normal" any more. What people may not realize, is that at the start of the pandemic, all courrier services (rightly) suspended "signature required" deliveries, in order to keep service pros safe.  Needless to say, unsigned packages left unaccountably, are a theives dream!!! We ended up calling customer service @Amalfi decor for SEVERAL replacements, which were repeatedly sent out and stolen.  I can't recall how many replacement shipments the ever patient Maria there sent us, but we FINALLY recieved our GORGEOUS apothecary jars after MANY failed/stolen shipments! I'm glad we tried and tried to get those darn jars!  IT WAS SO WORTH IT!!! I CAN'T SAY ENOUGH ABOUT THE WONDERFUL CUSTOMER CARE there at Amalfi Decor, Maria specifically. I know they lost $$$ inventory while trying to deliver my order.  One thing Amalfi decor HAS GAINED IS A LIFELONG FAN AND CUSTOMER.  In a time of great uncertainty, with so many "normal" aspects of life seeming to unravel, and formerly dependable services like parcel delivery, not performing well, it is a true comfort that a company in business this day is willing to go the extra mile, PLUS, for a customer.  For all this, THANK YOU,AMALFI DECOR, FROM THE BOTTOM OF MY HEART.  My home feels like a HOME thanks to Maria's effort. It means a lot since we are still in self quarantine!  Thanks again!Date of experience: June 14, 2020

Read the return policy BEFORE purchaseThe purchase and shipping was phenomenal.  They didn't waste any time whatsoever fulfilling my order.  Products were received in no time, which was great.  But in the end, I no longer needed them.  What's unfortunate is their return processing.  You essentially are on your own. The information I used, from their website to return my products, turned out not to be the correct address.  So as of right now my products are in the Universe somewhere.  Super unhappy.  Ensure you understand their return policy and hold them accountable for the correct return information.  Shame On Businesses!As an update to this review; once my review was read by the company, they contacted me right away to make all things right, right away.  It didn't workout the way they planned, however, the products were shipped back to them and they did refund our money so all is right in the world.  I just hope they took my feedback and the section on their site showing the incorrect information and updated it so that this doesn't happen again to someone else.  The End.Date of experience: January 06, 2020
